name: view_song_copy
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool view_song.
Tool description: View Sonv
API description: Retrieves detailed information about a song using the specified parameters.

https_only.description: Indicates if the request should use HTTPS only.

wmid.description: Identifier for the user or session making the request.

songid.description: Identifier for the song whose information is being retrieved.

s.description: Signature or token required for the API call.

country.description: Country code where the request is made from.
